attributes.action: Ban the right for TV broadcasting companies to 'increase VOLUME during the adverts' by way of sound compression
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: click vote against the TV companies that feel they should remain in control of our TV volume during the adverts. The ads are bad enough! Please! no louder. Yeah okay we know the sound is compressed making it appear louder. But lets just ban it!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
